full_summary:
=====================================

**Title and Description**
-------------------------

### Maintenance of Signage on Recreational Pathways

The National Capital Commission (NCC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the maintenance of signage on recreational pathways in the National Capital Region.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* **Reference Number:** 4285-96984503
* **Solicitation Number:** NR213
* **Publication Date:** March 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 6, 2023 (15:00 DST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 20, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2028
* **Contract Term:** Five (5) years, with the option to extend for up to two (2) additional one-year periods

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The successful bidder will be responsible for maintaining, inspecting, and repairing recreational pathway signage panels along the NCC's network of pathways in the National Capital Region.

**Tender Requirements**
-----------------------

* The contractor must satisfy all mandatory requirements outlined in Appendix B.
* The bid must be submitted electronically via email to [Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca) with a reference to the tender file #NR213.
* The bid email has a maximum capacity of 30 megabytes.

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

* **Senior Contract Officer:** Nathalie Rheault
* **Email:** [nathalie.rheault@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:nathalie.rheault@ncc-ccn.ca)
* **Phone:** 343-552-5974

**Important Notes**
-----------------

* All inquiries and communications must be directed only to Nathalie Rheault.
* Interested proponents must not contact any other employee of the NCC or other persons involved in this solicitation.
* Non-compliance with this requirement may result in disqualification.
* Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted.
* There is no public opening scheduled.

**Additional Information**
---------------------------

For more detailed information, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service website at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The official tender package, including all addenda, is available for download on this website. 

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

The responsive bid with the lowest total evaluated price will be recommended for a contract award.
